text: 7.17 Sng 23.1-2, Ais 25.8, 49.10, Ese 34.23, Jon 10.11, 10.14, Lep 5.6, 21.4 Taynen? Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ne bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdep nab sɨŋak mɨdeb ak, kɨlop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgab agak. Kɨlop poŋɨd ñɨg kɨlam junɨgab okok amek, ñɨg pel mɨdep ak ñɨŋɨnɨgabal agak. Pen God ne chaŋ ñɨg kɨlop ak mɨdupsek wik yokɨnɨgab agak.
